Welcome to the documentation for **Landfire.jl**.

## Overview

Landfire.jl is a Julia client for the [LANDFIRE Product Service API](https://lfps.usgs.gov/docs/api). It provides tools to query, download, and process LANDFIRE geospatial data products used in wildfire and vegetation analysis.

## Installation

```julia
using Pkg
Pkg.add("Landfire")
```

## Quickstart

```{julia}
using Landfire

# Browse available products
prods = Landfire.products(layer="FBFM13")
```
